title: I Almost Died After Being Trained Into A Dungeon, But I Endured And Returned With Incredible Strength - Novel Updates
tags: Dungeons   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   R-15   Special Abilities   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Nanjamonja   なんじゃもんじゃ
description:
Two years and two months since Rion had become a seeker delving into dungeons, he was still being made fun of by other seekers.

It was because his only ability was [Crystallisation], which he couldn’t use for anything other than creating pebbles. Normally he should have leveled up already, but it had already been two years and he was still a beginner.

Every day, he was constantly bullied and made a fool. One day, Rion fell into a massive, deep crack in the ground. It was called the Gate of Hell.

There, with fortune, he gained the special abilities [Demon Eye] and [Space-Time Manipulation], and even became able to more effectively use the ability he had from the start, [Crystallisation]. This was his awakening.>
